cleaned_text: Natural Balance Aromatherapy Pillow Spray Inspired by the beauty of botanicals and their wellbeing benefits, Balance's essential oils are calming, relaxing & balancing. Bringing peace, tranquility and comfort, it helps quiet a busy mind, relaxes, soothes and comforts. Made from pure essential oils of lavender. Diffusing natural essential oils can be both uplifting and balancing. Natural oils and the way in which they are blended add true benefits to your wellbeing. They should be an everyday affordable luxury. This carefully chosen essential oil pillow spray is inspired to make every sleep a nurturing and peaceful sleep. Created using 100% essential oils and recycled glass and packaging. All are made in the beautiful British countryside of the Cotswolds. Out of stock
